labs.title: Jerry
labs.description: Exploitation of an Apache Tomcat Manager instance by bypassing Basic Authentication using exposed default credentials, leading to WAR file upload and remote code execution via a reverse shell.

labs.title: Validation
labs.description: Web exploitation-focused machine involving HTML injection, XSS and SQL injection due to poor input sanitization. The attack path leads to arbitrary file write via SQL injection, allowing PHP web shell creation and remote code execution, followed by privilege escalation using exposed credentials.
